name: UpdateReferenceTable
description:
Update data, description, and tags of a reference table.

This tool updates a reference table by its ID, allowing changes to the data, description, or tags. It is useful when modifications are needed for existing reference tables, including those with different source types like LOCAL_FILE, S3, GCS, or AZURE.

parameters.name: reference_table_id
parameters.description: The ID of the reference table that needs to be updated.

value_schema.description: The ID of the reference table to update

parameters.name: update_data_description_tags
parameters.description: JSON object to update the reference table's data, description, and tags. Includes table ID, resource type, data attributes like description, file metadata, schema, sync status, and tags.

description.description: The description of the reference table.

type.description: The field type for reference table schema fields.

primary_keys.description: List of field names that serve as primary keys for the table. Only one primary key is supported, and it is used as an ID to retrieve rows.

sync_enabled.description: Whether this table is synced automatically.

tags.description: The tags of the reference table.

id.description: The ID of the reference table.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the reference table to update

value_schema.description: The ID of the reference table to update

description.description: The description of the reference table.

type.description: The field type for reference table schema fields.

primary_keys.description: List of field names that serve as primary keys for the table. Only one primary key is supported, and it is used as an ID to retrieve rows.

sync_enabled.description: Whether this table is synced automatically.

tags.description: The tags of the reference table.

id.description: The ID of the reference table.
